column2: hey how much will you give me to eat this whole jar of olives
i won’t give you anything but you’ll owe me 2
do you have a report due

okay let’s start with the free messages outside the un
i figure bodies at peace make peace
you might just get the first nobel prize in rubbing
so what country is this guy from
oh but wait i do have a globe
so pheebs what’s this guy like
umm well he’s very dashing y'know and umm very very sophisticated and he doesn’t speak any english but according to his translator he totally gets me
it’s a globe and a pencil sharpener
hey does anybody need anything copied
i’m going down to the xerox place
okay listen just give me anything i can make two of
well if you don’t have anything to copy why are you going down there
yeah are you just going down there to gawk at that hot girl with the belly button ring again
finish up with your customer first

and we’ll need a little more time to think about it
chloe switch with me there’s some guys here that got a crush on you
i haven’t seen you since this morning
hey what are you guys doing tomorrow night
he’s says ‘walking with you makes this strange city feel like home
although this city is my home so
so that’s dumb what i said don’t tell him i said that
he would like to kiss you

see there it is right there

except for y'know when you’re on a date and you’re getting along really great but the guy’s translator keeps getting in the way
what is ah rach in her room

doesn’t she know it’s our anniversary

oh that’s my doodle of a ladybug with a top hat
well there was a disaster in shipping and i’ve got to get this order in
honey i’m so sorry but it looks like i’m gonna be here all night
what do you well umm oh how about i come up there
no no no no honey please i’ve got i’ve just have so much to deal with
anyway i’m going out with sergei again tonight and um could you come and be the translator’s date
so that when we it’s time for our alone time you two could split off
y'know he’s really he’s kinda cute
yeah well kinda cute like really kinda cute or kinda cute like your friend spackel back larry
his name is spackel back harry
hey y'know what maybe we should get going
i mean what time did chloe say we should be there
yeah all right so we’ll hang out
hey remember when she brought up that thing about the three of us
she was kidding about that right
yeah i i i think so
god that would be weird it that situation presented itself tonight huh
yeah i mean what what would we do
but y'know what just in case maybe we should come up with a set of ground rules
probably want the first thing to be never open your eyes
y'know because you don’t want to be doing something and then look up and see something you don’t want to be seeing
what if me eyes are closed and and my hand is out there
oh hey how do we decide where we
well ah y'know we could flip for it
yeah i guess but what’s like heads and what’s tails
well it you don’t know that then i don’t want to do this with you
no no no i’m looking at a purchase order right here and it clearly states that we ordered the rivera bikini in a variety of sizes and colours
what does it matter what i’m wearing
can i please speak to your supervisor
my god what are you doing here
well you said you couldn’t go out so
you brought a picnic oh what a boyfriend
that’s it on monday i start wearing make up
ross honey this is very nice but but i i got a crisis
yeah but i got cous cous
honey honey i’m sorry i know it’s our anniversary but i told you on the phone i don’t have time to stop
okay you don’t have to stop i’m invisible i’m not here
well there is no mark robbinson in this office
get me mark on the phone
well let me just check that with what i got here all right see 038 is not the number for this store 038 is atlanta
i’m sorry as i was saying the store number is wrong and i’m sorry but that’s
excuse me i’m sorry i’m gonna have to call you back i’ve got a schemp in my office
but ah hey oh somebody’s off the phone how ‘bout a glass of wine by the fire i could get it going again
ross you’re not listening to me i don’t have time to stop
come on rach you don’t have what ten minutes
sophie does she have ten minutes
don’t yell at me okay this is the most i’ve seen you all week
look i cannot do this right now okay i’ve got a deadline would you just go home i’ll talk to you later
actually that’s our three hole punch
look um about what happened earlier
no hey well i i completely understand
i was gonna give you a chance to apologise to me
for letting you throw me out of your office
you had no right coming down to my office ross
you do not bring a picnic basket to somebody’s work
unless maybe they were a park ranger
yeah well excuse me for wanting to be with my girlfriend on our anniversary boy what an ass am i
but i told you i didn’t have the time
yeah well you never have the time
i mean i don’t feel like i even have a girlfriend anymore rachel
wh ross what do you want from me
you want me you want me to quit my job so you can feel like you have a girlfriend
no but it’d be nice if you realised it’s just a job
ross do you realise this is the first time in my life i’m doing something i actually care about
this is the first time in my life i’m doing something that i’m actually good at
no hey i get that okay i get that big time
and i’m happy for ya but i’m tired of having a relationship with your answering machine
okay i don’t know what to do anymore
i cannot keep having this same fight over and over again ross no you’re you’re you’re making this too hard
oh i’m i’m making this too hard
okay what do you want me to do
i don’t know i don’t know
look maybe we should take a break
let’s ah let’s take a break let’s cool off okay let’s get some frozen yogart or something
and the advances in collating in the past five years i mean we just got in an x 5000 y'know
the x 5000 makes the x 50 look like a t 71
i want you to met some friends of mine
this guy is my hero he comes in with some stuff he wants it blown up 400 we said we don’t do that and he says you gotta
and y'know what we did it
and now anytime anybody wants 400 we just say ‘let’s ross it
and that’s the only colour that comes in

ahh we’re gonna break up instead
oh and i can also speak a little french
voulez vous coucher avec moi ce soir
well you just asked if i wanted to go to bed with you tonight
no wonder i get such great service at cafe maurice

you didn’t say boutros boutros gali

eh he said thank you very much he thinks you look very pretty tonight your hair golden like the sun
i’m also thinking about opening up my own restaurant
monica can i talk to you behind my menu please
well i was having a conversation

what do you want me to do
just sit here silently while you three have a conversation
sorry i just thought you were somebody else

you wanna talk i mean i can come over
really no please please that’s that’s okay
all right all right i’m coming over and i’m bringing chinese food
oh yeah i’m not i’m not hungry
so what are you gonna do
one person wants to break up you break up
come on this is you guys call her and work it out

nothing he’s just really believes in that
oh and then we got into this big stupid fight

hey what do you want to drink
is it okay if i finish the apple juice
umm honey look he just came over to
hey dinosaur guy look at you so sad
hey you don’t have to smile
look i don’t feel like dancing i feel like having a drink
and the vet said it was time
and so from half a world away while my mother held the phone to his ear i said good bye to my dog
i just hope you hope you don’t accidentally suck it up through your nose and choke on it

i mean for the first time in three years somebody wants to actually want to talk to me but do you think he would let me enjoy that no
you silly diplomat why don’t you learn some english sergei
excuse me but umm isn’t he paying for your dinner
